headline: DoorDash, TKO, Williams-Sonoma, Expand Energy will join S&P 500
summary: DoorDash (DASH), TKO Group Holdings (TKO), Williams-Sonoma (WSM), and Expand Energy (EXE) will be part of the S&P 500 (^GSPC) starting on Monday. Yahoo Finance Head of News Myles Udland and Freedom Capital Markets chief global strategist Jay Woods discuss what being included in the index could mean for this group of stocks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.
